properties.description: The network interface identifier.

type.description: The network interface identifier.

properties.description: The IPv4 address of the network interface within the subnet.

properties.name: SubnetId
properties.description: The subnet identifier.

VpcSecurityGroup.description: Describes the members of a VPC security group.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the VPC security group.

type.description: The status of the VPC security group.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroupId
properties.description: The identifier of the VPC security group.

resource.description: Resource schema for a Redshift-managed VPC endpoint.

properties.name: ClusterIdentifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for the cluster. You use this identifier to refer to the cluster for any subsequent cluster operations such as deleting or modifying. All alphabetical characters must be lower case, no hypens at the end, no two consecutive hyphens. Cluster name should be unique for all clusters within an AWS account

type.description: A unique identifier for the cluster. You use this identifier to refer to the cluster for any subsequent cluster operations such as deleting or modifying. All alphabetical characters must be lower case, no hypens at the end, no two consecutive hyphens. Cluster name should be unique for all clusters within an AWS account

properties.name: EndpointName
properties.description: The name of the endpoint.

type.description: The name of the endpoint.

properties.name: ResourceOwner
properties.description: The AWS account ID of the owner of the cluster.

type.description: The AWS account ID of the owner of the cluster.

properties.name: SubnetGroupName
properties.description: The subnet group name where Amazon Redshift chooses to deploy the endpoint.

type.description: The subnet group name where Amazon Redshift chooses to deploy the endpoint.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroupIds
properties.description: A list of vpc security group ids to apply to the created endpoint access.

type.description: A list of vpc security group ids to apply to the created endpoint access.

attributes.description: Resource schema for a Redshift-managed VPC endpoint.

properties.name: Address
properties.description: The DNS address of the endpoint.

type.description: The DNS address of the endpoint.

properties.name: EndpointCreateTime
properties.description: The time (UTC) that the endpoint was created.

type.description: The time (UTC) that the endpoint was created.

properties.name: EndpointStatus
properties.description: The status of the endpoint.

type.description: The status of the endpoint.

properties.name: Port
properties.description: The port number on which the cluster accepts incoming connections.

type.description: The port number on which the cluster accepts incoming connections.

properties.name: VpcEndpoint
properties.description: The connection endpoint for connecting to an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

type.description: The connection endpoint for connecting to an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

properties.name: NetworkInterfaces
properties.description: One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.

type.description: One or more network interfaces of the endpoint. Also known as an interface endpoint.

properties.name: VpcEndpointId
properties.description: The connection endpoint ID for connecting an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

type.description: The connection endpoint ID for connecting an Amazon Redshift cluster through the proxy.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated.

type.description: The VPC identifier that the endpoint is associated.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroups
properties.description: A list of Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) security groups to be associated with the endpoint.

type.description: A list of Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) security groups to be associated with the endpoint.
